name: Bulbie's Kingdom Quest
description:
"The intention is there but I'm alone for this jam and it's the first time I develop a game by myself. I am sorry for the fact that the game has many bugs. 

 The idea is there, too bad I didn't have more time to fix the bugs."

Synopsis 

Every night, a survivor is added to Bulbie's camp, but being depressed or injured, the survivors are unable to venture into the forest to get precious resources like food.

Bulbie is their only means of survival in this vast world.

In exchange for the resources Bulbie brings back each night, Bulbie gets information to find his coveted princess who was lost after their village was razed to the ground by the barbarians. The survivors therefore work during the day at the campfire so that they can reward Bulbie's services.

Character

The Wizard 

The Wizard is a character who appears on the first night. He explains that he has escaped from a pack of wolves. Old and tired, he wants to stay in Bulbie's camp. In return, every morning he delivers a parchment with information about the princess that he was able to see with his magic ball.

The explorer 

Mihana has been an adventure and exploration enthusiast since she was very young... maybe a bit too much since she lost herself completely. She loves adventure and when she hears Bulbie's quest, she absolutely wants to join him. To do this, she will draw him a piece of map every day so that Bulbie can access new areas without fear.

The princess

So coveted by Bulbie, she is his destiny. She will never appear in the game or in the demo except in dialogue bubbles. 

Map

Day night cycle 

A day lasts 6 minutes and night falls. To sleep, you just have to stick to the tent and Bulbie automatically falls asleep.
